column6: All hell breaks loose as five gunslingers converge on the Blackguard military compound in lawless San Diablo. The Black Rider, Two-Gun Kid, Tex Dawson, Matt Slade and Tarantula are outnumbered and outgunned - but they're not going down without a fight! Non-stop, high-octane action from the DAREDEVIL: REBORN creative team of Andy Diggle and Davide Gianfelice!
column8: | writer:Andy Diggle | artist:DAVIDE GIANFELICE | artist:Butch Guice | colorist:Dave McCaig
